known_issues: Network deployment/publish is failing with a deployment error, preventing a Version 1 URL from being generated
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Playful cash register icon/mark in warm colors (pos-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Cart/checkout empty-state illustration with simple shapes, warm palette (empty-cart.dim_1200x800.png)
- Gift card illustration (rounded card with pattern, warm palette) (gift-card-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Resolve the deployment/publish failure so the existing Version 1 POS app can be built and deployed successfully, producing a working shareable URL that loads the app UI and can make backend calls.

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate a draft build (Version 1) and provide a working shareable link/URL

projectName: Publish a working Version 1 draft and provide a shareable URL
